<!-- source-hash: 086540e301c39454ea71bfa84b50b57e -->
A data transfer object (DTO) that wraps a paginated collection of log events with pagination metadata for audit log API responses.

## Key Components

- **logs** - List of `LogResponse` objects containing individual log events
- **pageInfo** - `PageInfo` object containing pagination details (page numbers, total count, etc.)

## Usage Example

```java
// Building a paginated logs response
LogsResponse response = LogsResponse.builder()
    .logs(Arrays.asList(
        LogResponse.builder()
            .eventType("LOGIN")
            .userId("user123")
            .timestamp(Instant.now())
            .build(),
        LogResponse.builder()
            .eventType("LOGOUT")
            .userId("user123")
            .timestamp(Instant.now())
            .build()
    ))
    .pageInfo(PageInfo.builder()
        .page(1)
        .size(10)
        .totalElements(25)
        .totalPages(3)
        .build())
    .build();

// Accessing the data
List<LogResponse> logEvents = response.getLogs();
PageInfo pagination = response.getPageInfo();
```

This response object is typically returned by audit log endpoints that need to display large datasets across multiple pages, providing both the log data and navigation information to clients.
